meanings.definition: relating to or affecting the adenohypophysis
meanings.sent1: The adenohypophyseal hormones play a crucial role in regulating body functions.
meanings.sent2: Doctors study the adenohypophyseal gland to understand its impact on health.
meanings.sent3: The adenohypophyseal activity was so high that it seemed like a busy marketplace inside the body.
meanings.sent4: Her enthusiasm for learning was like an adenohypophyseal surge, driving her to absorb knowledge.
meanings.sent5: The adenohypophyseal changes during puberty can be quite dramatic.

meanings.definition: of or relating to the anterior lobe of the pituitary gland
meanings.sent1: An adenohypophyseal disorder can affect hormone production in the body.
meanings.sent2: The adenohypophyseal cells release hormones that control various bodily functions.
meanings.sent3: The adenohypophyseal imbalance made his body act like a malfunctioning machine.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was an adenohypophyseal force driving her towards success.
meanings.sent5: Understanding the adenohypophyseal functions is essential for medical students.
